GSD.product_version: versions from v3.6 to before v5.15.78
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix use-after-free caused by l2cap_reassemble_sdu

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 8278a87bb1eeea94350d675ef961ee5a03341fde, it was introduced in version v3.6 by commit d2a7ac5d5d3a0b166ac128883bd088064c029fe5. For more details please see the references link.
